query.sql: "SELECT date, time, cs-username, s-port, cs-method, cs-uri-stem, sc-status, sc-bytes, cs-bytes, time-taken, cs(User-Agent) INTO MyTable01 FROM {0} WHERE cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%.asmx%' AND cs-method = 'GET' or cs-method = 'POST'"

"SELECT date, time, cs-username, s-port, cs-method, cs-uri-stem, sc-status, sc-bytes, cs-bytes, time-taken, cs(User-Agent) INTO MyTable02 FROM {0} WHERE cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%.jpg%' or cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%.asmx%'"

"SELECT date, time, cs-username, s-port, cs-method, cs-uri-stem, sc-status, sc-bytes, cs-bytes, time-taken, cs(User-Agent) INTO MyTable03 FROM {0} WHERE cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%.asmx%' AND cs-method = 'GET' or cs-method = 'POST'"
